msg.data:
res33: String = Scala library version 2.11.8 -- Copyright 2002-2016, LAMP/EPFL
res37: String = 2.1.0

paragraphs.text:
%sh

# You will now download a subset of 2008 flights (only 100k lines)
# The full dataset may be found here: http://stat-computing.org/dataexpo/2009/the-data.html

wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/roberthryniewicz/datasets/master/airline-dataset/flights/flights.csv -O /tmp/flights.csv
echo "Downloaded!"

paragraphs.title: Put onto hdfs (optional)
paragraphs.text:
%sh

# remove existing copies of dataset from HDFS
# hdfs dfs -rm -r -f /tmp/flights.csv

# put data into HDFS
# hdfs dfs -put /tmp/flights.csv /tmp/

%spark

// Create a flights DataFrame from CSV file
val flights = spark.read
              .option("header", "true")                              // Use first line as header
              .option("inferSchema", "true")                         // Infer schema
              .csv("/tmp/flights.csv")                               // Read data

msg.data: flights: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [Year: int, Month: int ... 27 more fields]

paragraphs.title: Print Schema

msg.data:
root
 |-- Year: integer (nullable = true)
 |-- Month: integer (nullable = true)
 |-- DayofMonth: integer (nullable = true)
 |-- DayOfWeek: integer (nullable = true)
 |-- DepTime: string (nullable = true)
 |-- CRSDepTime: integer (nullable = true)
 |-- ArrTime: string (nullable = true)
 |-- CRSArrTime: integer (nullable = true)
 |-- UniqueCarrier: string (nullable = true)
 |-- FlightNum: integer (nullable = true)
 |-- TailNum: string (nullable = true)
 |-- ActualElapsedTime: string (nullable = true)
 |-- CRSElapsedTime: integer (nullable = true)
 |-- AirTime: string (nullable = true)
 |-- ArrDelay: string (nullable = true)
 |-- DepDelay: string (nullable = true)
 |-- Origin: string (nullable = true)
 |-- Dest: string (nullable = true)
 |-- Distance: integer (nullable = true)
 |-- TaxiIn: string (nullable = true)
 |-- TaxiOut: string (nullable = true)
 |-- Cancelled: integer (nullable = true)
 |-- CancellationCode: string (nullable = true)
 |-- Diverted: integer (nullable = true)
 |-- CarrierDelay: string (nullable = true)
 |-- WeatherDelay: string (nullable = true)
 |-- NASDelay: string (nullable = true)
 |-- SecurityDelay: string (nullable = true)
 |-- LateAircraftDelay: string (nullable = true)

paragraphs.title: Select
Filter
paragraphs.text:
%spark
// Create a Dataset containing flights with delayed departure by more than 15 min using "filter"
val delayedFlights = flights
                        .select("UniqueCarrier", "DepDelay")
                        .filter($"DepDelay" > 15)
                        
delayedFlights.show()

paragraphs.title: Calculation of % of delayed flights
paragraphs.text:
%spark
val numTotalFlights = flights.count()
val numDelayedFlights = delayedFlights.count()

// Print total number of delayed flights
println("Percentage of Delayed Flights: " + (numDelayedFlights.toFloat/numTotalFlights*100) + "%")

msg.data:
numTotalFlights: Long = 100000
numDelayedFlights: Long = 19587
Percentage of Delayed Flights: 19.587%

paragraphs.title: User Defined Functions

paragraphs.text:
%spark
val flightsWithDelays = flights.select($"Year", $"Month", $"DayofMonth", $"UniqueCarrier", $"FlightNum", $"DepDelay", 
                    isDelayedUDF($"DepDelay").alias("IsDelayed"))      
                    
flightsWithDelays.show(5)

flightsWithDelays.agg((sum("IsDelayed") * 100 / count("DepDelay")).alias("Percentage of Delayed Flights")).show()     // done in one pass
